channel.title: KidTrax Audi R8 GT help
channel.description:
Hello Everyone,
I am looking to modify a KidTrax Audi R8 GT with 6v battery for one of my patients with a switch; basically disconnecting foot pedal and making it switch controlled. However, the wiring is much more complicated than the McQueen car and TMNT truck that I modified during Sam Logan’s course...Has anyone completed this modification or one similar to this? Also, does anyone have electrical engineering expertise that could provide input? Thanks so much!
